The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Cavefish
This article is about prepared cavefish. For the raw form, see Raw cavefish.

Cavefish are a type of inedible fish that are offered at the mysterious altar in the Ruins of Camdozaal, granting 7 Prayer experience.

Cavefish can be obtained by preparing a raw cavefish on the preparation table whilst having a knife. Preparing cavefish requires level 20 Cooking and grants 23 experience when successful. Players may ruin the cavefish during preparation, resulting in a ruined cavefish; the chance of failure while preparing these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels.

[[File:Cavefish detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Cavefish''' are a type of inedible [[fish]] that are offered at the [[Altar (Camdozaal)|mysterious altar]] in the [[Ruins of Camdozaal]], granting 7 [[Prayer]] experience.

Cavefish can be obtained by preparing a [[raw cavefish]] on the [[preparation table]] whilst having a [[knife]]. Preparing cavefish requires level 20 [[Cooking]] and grants 23 experience when successful. Players may ruin the cavefish during preparation, resulting in a [[ruined cavefish]]; the [[burn rate|chance of failure]] while preparing these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels.
